utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey-hey-hey. So what happened? A forest tick you off?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No. Y'know how we’re always saying we need a place for the mail.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I started building one. But then I decided to take it to the next step.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You’re building a post office?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, an entertainment unit, with a mail cubby built right in. It’s a one day job, max.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. My word! Those are snug.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah. These are my old work pants, Sergio Valente’s.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Power saw kinda got away from me there.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Any sign of your brother?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, but he’s always late.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I thought you only met him once?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I did. I think it sounds y'know big sistery, y'know, ‘Frank’s always late.’

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well relax, he’ll be here.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, I know, I’m just nervous. Y'know it’s just y'know Mom’s dead, don’t talk to my sister, Grandma’s been sleeping a lot lately. It’s like the last desperate chance to have a family, y'know, kinda thing. You’re so sweet to wait with me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, actually Gunther sent me. You’re not allowed to have cups out here, it’s a thing.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Does anyone else think David Copperfield is cute?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, but he told me, he thinks your a fox.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, Janice, likes him. In fact she likes him so much she put him on her freebie list.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Her what?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, we have a deal, where we each get to pick five celebrities that we can sleep with, and the other one can’t get mad.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ah, the heart of every healthy relationship. Honesty, respect, and sex with celebrities.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So, Chandler, who’s on your list?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ah, Kim Basinger, Cindy Crawford, Halle Berry, Yasmine Bleeth, and ah, Jessica Rabbit.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Now, you do realize that she’s a cartoon, and way out of your league?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know, I know, I just always wondered if I could get her eyes to pop out of her head.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, Monica, who would yours be?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: First, I need a boyfriend, then I can have a list.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It’s just a game Mon. Rach, how about you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I don’t know, I guess, Chris O’Donnel, John F. Kennedy, Jr., Daniel Day Lewis, Sting, and Parker Stevenson.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Spiderman?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hardy Boy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Peter Parker.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What about you honey, who would be on your list?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well I-I-I, that kind of thing requires some serious thought. First, I’ll divide my perspective canidates into catergories....

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What a geek!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Everbody this is Frank! This is my half-brother Frank.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Oh, hi.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: This is everybody. This is Ross.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: How are you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey-hey!

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: This is Monica.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Whoa!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And this is Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Whoa!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m gonna get coffee.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Hey, how do you guys get anything done?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We don’t, really.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, so, now, do you guys have a lot of big plans?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah! Yeah, no, we’re gonna connect, y'know bond, and everything.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Yeah, I was thinking that maybe we could go down to Time Square and pick up some ninja stars. And, oh, um, my friend Larry, he wants me to take a picture of a hooker.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know, we don’t really take advantage of living in the city.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I’m sorry. Did I get ‘ya?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, you didn’t get me!! It’s an electric drill, you get me, you kill me!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Calm down, do you want this unit or not?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I do NOT want this unit!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, you should’ve told me that before, I’m not a mind reader. Hey, we’re out of beer. I’m going to Monica’s.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Fine!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! Where ‘ya headin’ in those pants? 1982?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh Monica, listen, I ah, I saw down at the hardware store, they got those designer tiles on sale. If you ever want to redo the bathroom floor.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why, what’s wrong with my bathroom floor?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nothing. It’s just old and dingy, that’s all.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I highly doubt that.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah. If you ah, move your hamper, you see what color the tile used to be. Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can’t live like this! What are we gonna do? What are we gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Relax. Here hold this . This old stuff just comes right off.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s a little more than I wanted to see.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Aw! Look at that, every inch of this stuff is glued down. It’d take forever to pry this up. You should ah, you should just leave it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can’t leave it! You gouged a hole in my dingy floor.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Eh! There you go.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You know that’s nice, y'know we could put it back there after the surgeons remove it from your colon!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, ew!

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah I know what I wanted to ask you. Um, can you roll your tongue? Because I can, and my Mom couldn’t, and I thought y'know, I figured that was something I got from our Dad.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: What, wait, you mean like this?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah. You can do it to.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Your not doing it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh right, yeah okay, my Mom could, and I can’t. We don’t have that....

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: When’s your birthday?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Feburary 16th.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: I know a guy who’s the 18th.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow, that’s close. When’s yours?

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: October 25th.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That’s the same month as Halloween. So, um, what kinda things do you like to do at home?

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Melt stuff.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, I’ve got three of my five.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Three of your five, what?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Celebrities I’m allowed to sleep with.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! You are giving this a lot of thought.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, it’s hard okay, I only have two spots left.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, so who do you got it narrowed down to?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, Elizabeth Hurely....

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oooh-hoo, very attractive, forgiving.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Susan Sarandon.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Eh, y'know what, she’s to political, she probably wouldn’t let you do it, unless you donated four cans of food first.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And!! Isabella Rosselini.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ooh-hoo. Very hot, very sexy. But ah, y'know she’s too international, y'know she’s never gonna be around.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, you gotta play the odds, pick somebody who’s gonna be in the country like all the time.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, ‘cause that’s why you won’t get Isabella Rosselini, geography.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay so, by melting, you meant melting.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So is it like art?

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Yeah, you can melt art. Hey, can I use your phone?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Um, yeah sure. Why you wanna call your Mom?

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: No, I wanna melt it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, well um, not right now. Y'know I’m just gonna go to bed, I think the fumes are giving me a headache.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: G’night, bro.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: G’night.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Here. Y'know, just in case.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Oh, excellent.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What kind of karate is that?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No kind. He just makes it up.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So how’s it going with you guys?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So far, it kinda blows. I don’t know, I just thought y'know that he’d feel more like a brother y'know, like you and Ross, just like close and connected and....

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh honey, we’re close now but you-you wouldn’t believe the years of-of nugies, and wedgies, and flying wedgies, and atomic wedgies, and.... That’s where the waistband actually goes over your head.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ah!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, we used to drive each other crazy playing the shadow game.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, how do you play the shadow game?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, how do you play the shadow game?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I just asked you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I just asked you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don’t have time for this.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, that is what the game is.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Which you just gave up really quickly.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Have you seen Joey?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What’s the matter?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, just this! Y’know what it’s my fault really, because the couch is usually where we keep the varnish.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, does somebody wanna hand me one of those tiles.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He’s retiling my floor.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yo!! Spackel boy! Get up!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ah-ah-ah, now you started this, you will finish it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: He started mine first!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Build the unit Cinderelly, lay the tile Cinderelly.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Whoa! Big octopus.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. ‘Hello. Oh my God, I totally forgot! Well can’t someone else do it. But, I have company. Yeah, no look, that’s all right I’ll come in.’ Um, Frank, I’m really sorry but I have to go to work. It’s-it’s one of my regulars and he’s insisting that I do ‘um.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Hey, what kind of work do you do?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! I’m a masseuse. I give people massages and stuff.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: You-you work at one of those massage parlors?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, y'know we don’t call it that, but yeah!

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Wow! That’s wild! No, I had no idea.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All righty. I’ll be back in-in a little bit. Unless you wanna come with me?

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: You mean like watch?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, no, you can get one yourself. It’ll be on the house! Y'know what are big sisters for?

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Well, I don’t think this, y'know.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, no, no, I wouldn’t do you myself, I mean that would be weird. Yeah, no, I’ll get one of the other girls to do it. Oh, this will be so much fun! Hey! Are you excited?

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Yeah! Hey, do Monica and Rachel work there?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s beautiful! It’s like the first bathroom floor there ever was. Whoa! Are you going in there for?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What, like a number?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi! Bye!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, I’m done with my choices, these are final.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, it’s about time.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh, very official.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, well y'know Chandler printed it up on his computer.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And who laminated it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That would be me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right let me see. Uma Thurman, Winona Ryder, Elizabeth Hurely, Michelle Pfieffer, and Dorothy Hammel?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, it’s my list.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay honey, you do realize she only spins like that on ice.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Ow!-Ow!-Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow! Y'know, ow!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!-Hey! What’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: She broke my arm.

utterance.speaker: Girl
utterance.content: He touched my fanny.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: No, she touched mine first!

utterance.speaker: Girl
utterance.content: That’s my job!

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: So wait, what’s the deal here, I can have sex with you, but I can’t touch you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Girl
utterance.content: Ewww!!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You can’t have sex with her!

utterance.speaker: Girl
utterance.content: What’d you think I was, a hooker?

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: No, your a masseuse, it’s cool, I’m not a cop.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, Jasmine, can you, can you ask Mr. Whiffler if he can wait for like five minutes.

utterance.speaker: Jasmine
utterance.content: Fine. I don’t like you!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So that’s what you thought I did!! God! That’s not what I do!

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Wait that’s-that’s, what that’s not what you do?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Nooo! Why would you think that?

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: I don’t know, I mean, y'know, this is the city y'know, I just, I mean, I don’t know.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Whatever, it’s the perfect end to the perfect weekend anyways.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Oh, wait, no your right, no it was perfect and I can’t believe that I screwed it up so bad.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You really thought it was perfect?

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Well, no, maybe-maybe it wasn’t perfect, but y'know it was pretty cool, y'know, ‘cause we had all those great talks y'know.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, um, which ones in particular were great for you?

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Well y'know about the tongue thing, y'know, and how I told you about my likes and my dislikes...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don’t....

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: How-how I like to melt stuff, and how I dislike stuff that doesn’t melt.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Right, okay, um-mm.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Yeah, y'know I feel like I can really talk to you ‘cause y'know you’re my sister, y'know.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I guess I do, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Then I go feel your friend up and make you mad at me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I-I wasn’t hopping mad, y'know.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: You hopped a little bit. Yeah, I really sorry.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. All right, this is my favourite part of the weekend, right now, this.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: This?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Oh come on we went, we went to Time Square, we found ninja stars, I almost got arm broken by a hooker...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: She wasn’t a hooker.

utterance.speaker: Frank
utterance.content: Well, when I tell my friends about her she will be.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, on three. One....Two....

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why don’t we just go on two.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why two?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Because it’s faster.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I coulda counted to three like four times without all this ‘two’ talk.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, but in the future...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay!! Okay!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Come on!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Heavy thing, not getting lighter!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, one...two...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So we are going on two?

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: All right!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, good job Joe.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow, it’s big!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah-yeah, so big that it actually makes our doors look smaller!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Maybe, my ruler’s wrong.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Maybe all the rulers are wrong.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look it’s not that bad. So what, it blocks a little of your door, a little of my door.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, y'know what I got a better idea. How-how ‘bout it blocks none of mine door and a lot of yours?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, listen, before I forget that side is still wet.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay sir, um-mm, let see if I got this right. Ah, so this is a half-caf, double tall, easy hazel nut, non-fat, no foam, with whip, extra hot latte, right? Okay, great. You freak.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Isabella
utterance.content: Um, coffee to go, please.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Isabella Rosselini.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you serious? Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Damn! I can’t believe I took her off my list.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why? ‘Cause otherwise you’d go for it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, maybe.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh-oh, you lie.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What you don’t think I’d go up to her?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, it took you ten years to finally admit you liked me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, well missy, you better be glad that list is laminated.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You know what honey, you go ahead, we’ll call her an alternate.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, hold my crawler.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rach, are you really gonna let him do this?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Honey, he’s about to go hit on Isabella Rosselini. I’m just sorry we don’t got popcorn.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi! Hi, I’m Ross, you don’t know me, but I’m a big, big fan of yours. I mean, Blue Velvet, woo-oo hoo! Um, I was wondering if I could um, maybe buy you a cup of coffee? Or maybe reimburse you for that one?

utterance.speaker: Isabella
utterance.content: Aren’t you with that girl over there?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, yeah, kinda. Um, but that’s okay, see we have an understanding, um, see we each have this list of five famous people, so I’m allowed to sleep with you. No, no, no, it’s flattery.

utterance.speaker: Isabella
utterance.content: I’m sorry.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh no, no, no, wait, wait, Isabella. Don’t, don’t just dismiss this so fast. I mean this is a once in a lifetime opportunity...

utterance.speaker: Isabella
utterance.content: Yeah, for you. Is that the list?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Um, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Isabella
utterance.content: May I see it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Um, no.

utterance.speaker: Isabella
utterance.content: Come on!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: But, okay.

utterance.speaker: Isabella
utterance.content: I’m not on the list!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Um, see, but that’s not the final draft.

utterance.speaker: Isabella
utterance.content: It’s laminated!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, um, okay see, you were, you were on the list but my friend, Chandler brought up the very good point that you are international, so I bumped you for Wynona Rider, local.

utterance.speaker: Isabella
utterance.content: Y'know it’s ironic...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Isabella
utterance.content: ...because I have a list of five goofy coffee house guys and yesterday I bumped you for that guy over there.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We’re just gonna be friends.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y'know what?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Umm?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I bet ‘ya ya I could fit in there.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’ve got five bucks says you can’t.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Get out your checkbook, mister.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I think I have the cash.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You are dogged man! I totally fit!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, you got me. I’m out five big ones! Here you go.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thank you. Cha-ching! Oh, well hello Mr. Lincoln. Better luck next time buddy. And the drinks are on me!
